Name: battery module packaging production, Li-ion | battery module packaging, Li-ion | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/272:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators/2720:Manufacture of batteries and accumulators
Description: The module is based on an aluminium casing sealed by double seaming, a process that is common in the container industry, in order to provide an additional barrier to the loss of electrolyte solvent from the cells and the entrance of water vapor. The cells are placed in the module and the terminals of adjacent cells are connected either mechanically or by laser welding. The top and bottom of the module is left open to allow air to flow between the cells to cool them.;Reference:;Nelson, P. A., Gallagher, K. G., Bloom, I. D., & Dees, D. W. (2012). Modeling the performance and cost of lithium-ion batteries for electric-drive vehicles (No. ANL-12/55). Argonne National Lab.(ANL), Argonne, IL (United States).
